precondition: The Windows XP desktop is visible.
The context menu titled 'Arrange Icons By ▶' is open on the desktop.
expected_results: The context menu will close, and the Display Properties window will open.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Themes" tab is active.
expected_results: The "Screen Saver" tab will become active. The options for themes will be replaced with options for screen savers.

precondition: The Display Properties window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is active.
action: Click on the downward-pointing arrow of the 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu.
expected_results: The 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu will expand, showing a list of screen saver options including 'My Pictures Slideshow', 'Mystify', and 'Starfield'. The 'Settings' and 'Preview' buttons will become active.

precondition: The "Screen Saver" dropdown menu within the "Display Properties" window is open.
action: Click the "None" option in the "Screen Saver" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The dropdown menu will close, the "Wait" time box will populate with "10", and the "Settings" and "Preview" buttons will remain inactive.

precondition: The 'Screen Saver' tab of the 'Display Properties' window is open.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' window will open in front of the 'Display Properties' window.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power schemes" dropdown menu is visible.
action: Click the "Power schemes" dropdown menu and select "Home/Office Desk".
expected_results: The "Turn off hard disks" setting will change to "Never".

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open with the "Power Schemes" tab selected. The "Power schemes" dropdown menu should display "Always On".
action: Click the "Power schemes" dropdown menu and select "Home/Office Desk".
expected_results: The "Power schemes" dropdown menu will display "Home/Office Desk", the "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu will change to "After 20 mins", and a pop-up box titled "Keep your computer up to date" will appear in the bottom right corner of the screen.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Always On" power scheme is selected.
action: Click on the "After 20 mins" option within the "Turn off monitor" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Turn off monitor" setting will display "After 20 mins" and a pop-up box titled "Keep your computer up to date" will appear in the bottom right corner of the screen.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open with the "Power Schemes" tab selected. The "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu is open.
action: Click the "Never" option in the "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu will close. The "Turn off monitor", "Turn off hard disks", "System standby", and "System hibernates" settings will all be set to "Never". A system notification about keeping the computer up-to-date may appear.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Apply" button is active.
expected_results: A "Keep your computer up to date" notification balloon will appear in the bottom right corner of the screen.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open with the "Always On" power scheme selected.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will close and a "Keep your computer up to date" notification will appear in the bottom left corner of the screen.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open, and the 'Screen Saver' tab is active. The 'OK' button is visible at the bottom of the window.
